data.comment: Yago Pikachu (Vasco da Gama) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match is underway in Goiania.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
Vasco da Gama's Vinicius has run offside.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 3, Keko for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Serra Dourada.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 4, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goias throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 6, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Goias's area.
Vasco da Gama's Carlinhos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 10, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Goias's Shaylon is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Goias a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 17, Leo Matos scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Leonardo Gil to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Serra Dourada.
In Goiania, Ribamar of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 21, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Goias.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Goias's half.
Goias to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In Goiania Goias drive forward through Edilson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 27, Goias are pushing forward but Fernandao's finish is wide of the goal.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 27, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ariel Cabral (Goias) gets a yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Talles Magno, who is grimacing with pain.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Vasco da Gamaâ€™s Talles Magno is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Henrique Silva (Vasco da Gama) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Goias's Heron has been booked in Goiania.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Goias are coming forward and Keko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Serra Dourada.
Talles Magno is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 38, Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) has taken off Talles Magno who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Guilherme Parede is the replacement.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 39, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Goias's half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Goiania.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Free kick in a good position for Vasco da Gama!
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Ribamar looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Ribamar for Vasco da Gama is still down.
Leo Matos is booked for the away team.
Keko (Goias) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Serra Dourada.
Breno of Goias smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Goias in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
Leonardo Gil (Vasco da Gama) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 48, Goias pushes forward through Keko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 51, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 54, Vinicius Lopes for Goias has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 56, Ricardo Graca (Vasco da Gama) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Shaylon gets an equalizer for Goias. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Ricardo Graca (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 62, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Fellipe Bastos replacing Leonardo Gil.
Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's third substitution at Serra Dourada with Neto Borges replacing Henrique Silva.
Vasco da Gama make their fourth substitution with Martin Benitez replacing Carlinhos.
Goias to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Edilson is booked for the home team.
Rafael Moura is replacing Fernandao for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 67, Goias have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In Goiania, David Duarte (Goias) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Ribamar for Vasco da Gama is whistled offside.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Keko returns to the field for Goias after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Keko is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira blows against Vasco da Gama's Ribamar for offside.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Fellipe Bastos for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 74, Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
Goias drive upfield and Rafael Moura gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rafael Moura, who is down injured.
Rafael Moura has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Vinicius with Tiago Reis. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ricardo Sa Pinto.
Ribamar for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 80, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
The home team replace Shaylon with Gilberto.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias just outside Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 82, Douglas Baggio is replacing Vinicius Lopes for the home team.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Goias.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rafael Moura of Goias is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 86, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goias throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 88, Attention is being given to Vasco da Gamaâ€™s Fernando Miguel and play has been suspended briefly.
Vasco da Gamaâ€™s Fernando Miguel is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ribamar of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goias have a goal kick.
In Goiania, Douglas Baggio (Goias) misses the target with a header.
Rafael Moura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goias.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goias.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Vasco da Gama will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goias.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias push forward at Serra Dourada and Rafael Moura gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Vasco da Gama defence.
Goias to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Goiania.
In Goiania Vasco da Gama's Ribamar is caught offside.
That's full-time at Serra Dourada. The final score is 1-1.
